Property.name: menuInput
Property.HelpText: Configure the button to open the Skin Selector menu, this is based on Xbox and Playstation controller. You can always open the menu by pressing i on the keyboard.

Property.name: saveSkin
Property.HelpText: This will save your last skin selected for each players and characters. That way when you will restart SA2 or change stage, the last selected skin will be loaded.
